name: Catify VR
description: Embody a Parisian cat in VR and live the everyday life of a feline: walking, jumping, night-watching and clawing!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5- 4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or greater DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: -
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: CPU: Intel Core i7- 7700k equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 or greater DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: -
